attributes.action: pressure the European and Spanish governments  to ban bullfighting around the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bullfighting is not a sport or fight of any kind.
It is a torture by a gang of armed thugs against a lone, frightened, and wounded animal.

A normal brain can not comprehend how today's civilized-looking people enjoy watching this barbaric torture.

By signing this petition we ask the Prime Minister and all Party/MP back us in putting pressure on the appropriate governments to put a stop to this "SPORT"
